description: Lilly is a lifestyle girl and a member of hogtied. So, when she wrote and wanted to try Hogtied, we welcomed her. Lilly has another redeeming quality: she is tough! She took what we could shell out to her, without batting an eye. She likes it WAY rough, rougher then Hogtied does, however, we still made it hard for our little member in the end. So, we give you a little role-play, and some real hot BDSM action for this week's update.
title: Sgt. Major and Lilly
